auth: Connection settings of the Tautulli instance
auth_info: The connection settings for the Tautulli instance. You will find the API key in the Tautulli dashboard via settings -> web interface in the API section (at the end of the page).
events: Subscribe / listen to events (Configuration of the webhook)
events_info: Listening to events allows you to receive events from Plex via Tautulli.
refresh_info: Time for refreshing all settings / information (in seconds). If set to 0, settings will only be refreshed on adapter startup.
